bio: Let's Bring Real News Back to TV! -Sarah Jones Reports -Tweets, Posts & RTs RPs are not endorsements, views are my own TRT World Output Producer Al Jazeera America Deputy News Editor Channel 4 Freelance Online Journalist Gulf News, part of Al Nisr Publishing Freelance Journalist for Gulf News CNN Freelance International Assignment Editor P.S BEARING WITNESS Editor-in-Chief BBC Worldwide Newsgathering Planning Desk Team Member BBC Worldwide Special Interview Producer American Broadcasting Company Associate Producer for "Someone You Should Know" with Harry Porterfield on ABC 7 News Chicago
